subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Eric Young Jr.’s two-run homer in the 11th inning gave the Mets a hard-fought victory after David Wright limped off in the 10th with a hamstring injury.
snippet: Eric Young Jr.’s two-run homer in the 11th inning gave the Mets a hard-fought victory after David Wright limped off in the 10th with a hamstring injury.
